ISSUE.TITLE: Tinymce editor warning
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 RC Text color plugin is now built in to the core editor, please remove it from your editor configuration.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6088 Updated AdminLte (includes bootstrap 4.6.0) and removed bootstrap css from admin panel

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6090 Text color plugin is now built in to the core Tinymce editor
